TextView.android:text: The Samsung Galaxy M11 features a 6.4-inch Infinity-O display, 1.8Ghz octa-core processor, 3GB of RAM and 32GB of internal storage, and 5000mAh battery. There is also a small punch hole in the top-left corner for the 8-megapixel selfie camera at the front of the phone. On the back is situated a triple-camera setup with a 13MP main sensor, a 5MP ultra-wide-angle shooter and a dedicated 2MP depth sensor.
